distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for virglrenderer fixes the following issues:
	  
- CVE-2022-0135: Fixed out-of-bonds write in read_transfer_data() (bsc#1195389).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: An out-of-bounds write issue was found in the VirGL virtual OpenGL renderer (virglrenderer). This flaw allows a malicious guest to create a specially crafted virgil resource and then issue a VIRTGPU_EXECBUFFER ioctl, leading to a denial of service or possible code execution.
notes.title: Vulnerability description

fixed: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP1-ESPOS:libvirglrenderer0-0.6.0-4.9.1.aarch64
SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP1-ESPOS:libvirglrenderer0-0.6.0-4.9.1.x86_64
